reviewText: Great storyline with the same cast... But I still LOVE  the first...

one of the best shows EVER!!! Buy it...You won't regret it!!!

These bears are true to life and funny as they want to be.  I have enjoyed all three seasons so much as these three bears and Toddy the Hottie of the group solve crime and get to see some hot sexy guys along the way.  The locations are super and the camera work is fantastic and they hold true to a timeline for the plots and the seasons.

Absolutely love this series! These are full length movies. Silly, hysterically funny, great fun! Don't look for oscar worthy drama here. Lighten up and enjoy the silly humor and all of the great looking bears! I love how the actors seem like they are having so much fun! Makes it even more enjoyable.
Boy did they go over the top with this one! Even more twists and how the actors get along so well. You can tell all of the actors just love doing this! Please tell me there will be a number four.
I lo ve this movie.

The Bears are Awesome!! The handsome men are talented, easy on the eyes and definitely, keeps my attention in a way I can't find on the streets or in the clubs! I would love to see more from them and even audition for them! I have some favorites in this movie and that's my personal business ;) Ratings are up and through the ROOF for me ;)
Campy.  So so acting.  Same jokes over and over.
Great addition to my collection of this multi-part series. Plays like new
Good show

Pure camp and hilarious to boot.  Hot Toddy, what a hunk.
Silly mystery fun!
Hilarious, movie . Great cast. Must watch. Shows Bear community in wonderful light.
Don't pass this series up!

Enjoyed it immensely
I Have enjoyed the entire series and I am looking forward to season 4.

great movie, very funny. Me and my friends really enjoyed it.
Now I have the 3 films
We love all three seasons, support these guys to make more, they are very enjoyable and made from the heart. - Many laughs too!

I don't know if it was due to a slightly bigger budget or whether the writers are getting more confident, but this was the best written, best acted and funniest season so far of this show. The final episode is a classic, with a seamless mix of raunchy gay humor and old fashioned slap stick comedy.
Im definitely excited about a season 4 ahead.
Really fun webseries!  And great extras!  If you missed it online, buy the DVDS!
It was a great way to end the showes. I was a fun way to spend a day.
Funny gay bear humor, a bit slow in a couple of places, however, quite impressive for movie on a $100K budget.
Fantastic and funny
As a parody of other scripts, it's okay.
Very funny. Cute bears

If you want something that is both entertaining and addictive at the same time this will be the movie(s) to watch. I have watched all 3 seasons including the special editions. The cast is extremely funny but at the same they can be very sentimental. This would be great for TV!!
A hairy man lovers dream
The best yet.  These guys are getting better and better.  Great ensemble work

Have seen the first to seasons of this and enjoyed the storylines and jokes. The acting is mediocre, but the eye candy is quite enjoyable. They do kickstarters online for future seasons and they just made their goal to do a 4th season. Looking forward to it. Enjoy boys,... I mean bears...  ;-)
Played great very funny and a lot of hot bears to

True to the format, Season #3 has all the same characters, each one delightful to follow. But about 2/3rds of the way into this one, I felt it was getting a tad tiresome as more and more murder suspects get suggested. But THEN they added the most over the top finale segment ever of a plane full of Bears flying to Australia. This was the most hilarious episode of all! Buy some of the  diapers they show in Nelson's ads  as you will wet your pants laughing! ha ha! I also have really enjoyed the special holiday episodes they give you as an added feature on each season's dvd. Can we look forward now  to a Valentine's special  where Todd proposes? PLEASE? It's all growl-iscious!
gay sleuths
Price is high, this should be in Blu-ray format.
Very camp and funny.
So much fun and so many laughs.
As always the boys are hilarious and plenty of eye candy

My third purchase of this series. I understand that these are all suppose to be murder mysteries that are quite campy, but after the tird one, I'm moving on the something else. Got kinda predictable and a little over the top for me.
OMG!  These guys are so funny!  Love these movies!
Loved Loved Loved it! These just keep getting better.
its okay somewhat predictable... These guys need to go to more bars, visit more places do a drag show show more hot guys.
